data.actual_result: The extra popup stays open and has a Send button even though no file is selected. Tapping it won't do anything
data.expected_result: Either the extra popup should close, or at least it shouldn't have a Send button unless you select a file again
data.short_description: Opening two instances of the Add attachment popup and sending an image will cause the Send button to appear on the second instance even though no file is selected
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap the Add File (+) button twice quickly. This should open two popups stacking over each other - Select an image and press Send
